title: Mordekaiser - negative Ability Power
body:
Today i wanted to know how mordekaisers q-Spell interacts with sated devourer. While playing a bot came it happened that i had "-1" ability power on mordekaiser.
The setup was:
Custom game on Summoners Rift.
Only bots on both sides (and me).
I did not skill extra ability power in masteries in any way.
I had no ability power in runes.
What i did was:
1. I build a devourer
2. I kill the dragon
3. I killed someone
4. I reached full stacks on Devourer.
5. I had "-1" ability power.
